hero.title: Your Gateway to Singapore Education Success

about.title: About Candellar
about.mm: Myanmar Office: V5PJ+PRV, Pho Yarzar St, Yangon — AEIS & Singapore exam prep.
about.sg: Singapore Office: 8 Somapah Rd, #01-310, Singapore 487372 — affordable tuition.
about.mission: We provide accessible, credible, skills-based learning to help students succeed in Singapore's education system.

programs.aeisDesc: Comprehensive preparation for Singapore's entrance examinations

team.title: Our Team
